title: Boulder-Based Riley Sheehan Stuns with Victory at Paris-Tours: ‘This Could Be a Big Start for Me’
content:
23-year-old U.S. racer wins historic dirt-road classic in only his sixth race as Israel-Premier Tech trainee.

Read the full article at Boulder-Based Riley Sheehan Stuns with Victory at Paris-Tours: ‘This Could Be a Big Start for Me’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
